alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton; Fayette; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 9:29PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clayton, northern Fayette, Allamakee, Winneshiek, northwestern Grant and southwestern Crawford Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 928 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waucoma to near Guttenberg. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Decorah, Prairie Du Chien, Waukon, West Union, Guttenberg, Elkader, Postville, Monona, Calmar, McGregor, Ossian, Garnavillo, Elgin, Clermont, Hawkeye, Marquette, Spillville, Fort Atkinson, Harpers Ferry and Ridgeway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Iowa...and southwestern Wisconsin.
